name: Dawn Of A Little World
description:
A little tile game inspired by classic board games, with a little CCG and 4x influence thrown in. Thought of the idea for this ages ago after playing some other hex tile placement games, basically, "what if the tiles, y'know, did stuff?". Never got around to trying the concept out until now, so here it is!

Tiles are from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/painted-2d-location-hexes-... and some other assorted assets.
